# Misollarni koâ€˜rsatish

<div style={{ textAlign: "center" }}>
  <Image
    src={"/docs/assets/basics/few_shot.svg"}
    width={1836}
    height={626}
    style={{

</div>
<br />

<Takeaways>
  - Zero, one va few-shot prompting ni oâ€˜rganing
  - Few-shot prompting yordamida chiqishlaringizni tuzilmali qiling
</Takeaways>

Yana bir prompting strategiyasi bu _few-shot prompting_(@logan-iv-etal-2022-cutting)(@lake2015human)[^a], bu asosan modelga siz xohlagan narsani bajarish uchun bir nechta misollar[^b] (shuningdek, "shots" deb ataladi) koâ€˜rsatishdan iborat. Few shot prompts sunâ€™iy intellektga shu bir nechta misollardan oâ€˜rganish imkonini beradi(@zhao2021calibrate).

Yuqoridagi misolni koâ€˜rib chiqing, unda biz mijozlarning fikr-mulohazalarini ijobiy yoki salbiy deb tasniflashga harakat qilyapmiz. Biz modelga uchta ijobiy/salbiy fikr-mulohaza misollarini koâ€˜rsatamiz, soâ€˜ngra hali tasniflanmagan yangi fikr-mulohazani (`It doesnt work!:`) koâ€˜rsatamiz. Model birinchi uchta misol `positive` yoki `negative` deb tasniflanganini koâ€˜radi va shu maâ€™lumotdan foydalanib yangi misolni `negative` deb tasniflaydi.

## Tuzilma

Misollarni qanday tuzishimiz juda muhim. Ushbu uchta misolni `input: classification` formatida tashkil qilganimiz sababli, model yakuniy qatordan soâ€˜ng bitta soâ€˜z hosil qiladi, toâ€˜liq gap emas, masalan, `this review is positive`.

### Tuzilma haqida batafsil

Few-shot prompting uchun asosiy qoâ€˜llanilish holati â€” chiqishni **aniq bir tarzda tuzilgan** boâ€˜lishi kerak boâ€˜lganda, bu tuzilmani modelga tushuntirish qiyin boâ€˜lsa. Buni tushunish uchun quyidagi misolni koâ€˜rib chiqamiz: deylik, siz iqtisodiy tahlil olib boryapsiz va yaqin atrofdagi shaharlardagi mashhur fuqarolarning ismlari va kasblarini mahalliy gazeta maqolalarini tahlil qilib toâ€˜plashingiz kerak. Siz modeldan har bir maqolani oâ€˜qib, ismlar va kasblar roâ€˜yxatini `First Last [OCCUPATION]` formatida chiqarishini xohlaysiz. Buni amalga oshirish uchun modelga bir nechta misollar koâ€˜rsatishingiz mumkin. Ularni koâ€˜rish uchun embedga qarang.

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?%3D%3D"
  style={{
    width: "100%",
    height: "500px",
    border: "0",
    borderRadius: "4px",
    overflow: "hidden",
  }}
  sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

Modelga toâ€˜gâ€˜ri chiqish formati misollarini koâ€˜rsatish orqali, u yangi maqolalar uchun ham toâ€˜gâ€˜ri chiqish bera oladi. Biz bu natijani instruction prompt yordamida ham olgan boâ€˜lardik, lekin few-shot prompt koâ€˜proq barqaror ishlaydi.

## Shot Prompting turlari

"Shot" soâ€˜zi "misol" bilan sinonimdir. Few-shot prompting dan tashqari, yana ikki xil shot prompting turi mavjud. Bu variantlar orasidagi yagona farq â€” modelga nechta misol koâ€˜rsatilishida.

### Zero-Shot Prompting

Zero-shot prompting prompting â€” promptingning eng oddiy koâ€˜rinishi. U modelga misollarsiz prompt koâ€˜rsatadi va javob yaratishni soâ€˜raydi. Shu sababli, hozirgacha koâ€˜rgan barcha instruction va role promptlar zero-shot prompt hisoblanadi. Zero-shot promptga yana bir misol:

<AIInput>Add 2+2:</AIInput>

Bu zero-shot, chunki biz modelga hech qanday toâ€˜liq misol koâ€˜rsatmadik.

### One-Shot Prompting

One-shot prompting â€” modelga bitta misol koâ€˜rsatilganda. Masalan, zero-shot promptning one-shot analogi `Add 2+2:` quyidagicha boâ€˜ladi:

<AIInput>
  {`Add 3+3: 6
Add 2+2:`}
</AIInput>

Biz modelga faqat bitta toâ€˜liq misol (`Add 3+3: 6`) koâ€˜rsatdik, shuning uchun bu one-shot prompt hisoblanadi.

### Few-shot prompting

Few-shot prompting â€” modelga 2 yoki undan ortiq misol koâ€˜rsatilganda. Yuqoridagi ikki promptning few-shot analogi quyidagicha:

<AIInput>
  {`Add 3+3: 6
Add 5+5: 10
Add 2+2:
`}
</AIInput>

Bu few-shot prompt, chunki biz modelga kamida 2 ta toâ€˜liq misol (`Add 3+3: 6` va `Add 5+5: 10`) koâ€˜rsatdik. Odatda, modelga qancha koâ€˜p misol koâ€˜rsatsangiz, natija shuncha yaxshi boâ€˜ladi, shuning uchun koâ€˜pchilik holatlarda few-shot prompting zero-shot va one-shot prompting ga nisbatan afzalroqdir.

## Xulosa

Xulosa qilib aytganda, few-shot prompting â€” modelni aniq va toâ€˜gâ€˜ri tuzilgan javoblar yaratishga yoâ€˜naltira oladigan samarali strategiyadir. Bir nechta misollar koâ€˜rsatish orqali, few-shot prompting modelga kerakli chiqish formatini tushunishga va mos ravishda javob berishga yordam beradi, bu esa koâ€˜pchilik holatlarda zero-shot va one-shot prompting ga nisbatan afzal usul hisoblanadi[^c].

[^a]: Few-shot prompting ga in-context learning ham deyiladi.
[^b]: Bu misollar uchun texnik atama _exemplars_ hisoblanadi.
[^c]: Bu texnikalar misollar boâ€˜lmaganda foydalidir.
